# Avik Mukherjee â€” Full-Stack Software Developer Portfolio

> Avik Mukherjee is a full-stack software developer specializing in Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Node.js. This portfolio showcases projects, professional experience, technical writing, and resume.

## About

Avik Mukherjee is a software engineer currently working at SuperAlign AI. He builds scalable web applications that help businesses grow and solve real-world problems. Previously shipped features at DataFoundry AI, Dank, and other startups.

## Sections

- [Home](https://avikmukherjee.me): Main landing page with overview of work, experience, and writing
- [Projects](https://avikmukherjee.me/projects): Personal and professional projects built with modern web technologies
- [Experience](https://avikmukherjee.me/experience): Professional work history and roles at various companies
- [Blog](https://avikmukherjee.me/blog): Technical writing about development techniques, project insights, and lessons learned
- [Resume](https://avikmukherjee.me/resume): Detailed professional resume and qualifications

## Featured Projects

- **PulsePing**: Serverless deployment monitoring tool solving cold start problems (Go, Next.js)
- **FormCraftAI**: Open-source, no-code AI form builder with drag-and-drop design
- **WebTracker**: Privacy-focused web analytics platform
- **PeerShare**: Secure peer-to-peer file sharing and video calling app (WebRTC)
- **ChessAI**: Chess game with AI opponent built with Next.js and AI SDK

## Technical Skills

- Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- Backend: Node.js, HonoJS, Express
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, DuckDB
- Tools: Docker, Git, Vercel, AWS
